refnamediv.refpurpose: list, add or remove an environment

refentry.refsect1:
DESCRIPTION
kaenv register, display and delete environment from the database. you can see all the information of an environment with -e or delete it with --del. You can see the environment of another user with -l.

refsect1.title: EXAMPLE
refsect1.para: remove the environment debian for the current user.
register the environment debian4all with the user yoyz.
